casebody.data:
2002-1968 (La. 10/25/02)

Clara HUBBS v. ANCO INSULATIONS, INC., McCarty Corporation, AC & S, Inc., Armstrong World Industries, Fibreboard Corporation, Flintkote Company, GAF Corporation, Owens-Corning, Fibreglas Corporation, Pittburgh Corning Corporation, Owens-Illinois Inc, Rockwool Manufacturing Company and T & N, PLC. No. 2002-C-1968. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Anco Insulations Inc. et al.;—Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of E. Baton Rouge, 19th Judicial District Court Div. D, No. 392,836; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2001 CA 0508.

Denied.
